titleStmt.title: Mechanick exercises, or, The doctrine of handy-works by Joseph Moxon.
titleStmt.author: Moxon, Joseph, 1627-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by J. Moxon,

notesStmt.note: Each of the sections has special t.p. with varying imprint dates. Pagination is continuous, except for the last section "Brick-layers work", which has separate pagination.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
